resources.string: Upload any fileEntity and get a sharable link for that fileEntity.
App requires certain permissions to function properly.
App Can\'t work without the permission. You have to manually enable those permissions from App settings.
This app needs your permission to read Phones storage to access fileEntities.
No internet connection!. Please try again.
Ephemeral file sharing\nConvenient, anonymous\n and secure
Looks like something bad happened. We are taking a look at what really happened. Meanwhile, you can try restarting the app.
Looks like you aren\'t connected to the network.\nPlease Check your internet connection and try again.
It seems like you haven\'t uploaded any files yet. Upload a file and check in here again.
File added to upload queue.\nYou will be notified once the file is uploaded!
The link will be invalid once visited or when the set time expires. The file associated with it will be deleted permanently.
Choose the expire time of the fileEntity.
Ephemeral file sharing\n Convenient, anonymous and secure

You can dismiss this dialog and carry on with your work. File will be uploaded in the background and you will be notified once its done.
